Absence

#Illustrator   #Photoshop

A wordmark I created for an imaginary show called "Absence". The story is set in the future where mind reading technology has been fully developed and taken root in peopleâ€™s daily lives. They use a wearable device to translate neural signals to words and actions. People enjoy and celebrate the benefits of this technology until one day a series of strange things happen, they begin to realize their minds have been monitored and controlled by the government.
